sentences.sContent: Some of the mosaics postdate this period.
sentences.sCn: 这些镶嵌画中有些要晚于这段时期。

remMethod.val: post (在后面) + date (日期) → 推迟…的日期

trans.tranCn: 填迟……的日期；把……的日期填迟；继……之后
trans.tranOther: if you postdate a cheque, you write it with a date that is later than the actual date, so that it will not become effective until that time
